actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 115-528.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining

official_title: A bill to provide for the expansion of the Desert Tortoise Habitat Conservation Plan, Washington County, Utah.
short_title: Washington County, Utah, Public Land Act

summary.text:
Washington County, Utah, Public Land Act

This bill expands the Desert Tortoise Habitat Conservation Plan to include additional habitat for the desert tortoise in Utah and recognizes a transportation and utility corridor in the Beaver Dam Wash National Conservation Area.
